Notes¶

  • This is a direct translation from `BCT’s function “diffusion_efficiency.m” <hhttps://sites.google.com/site/bctnet/Home/functions/diffusion_efficiency.m>

dyfunconn.graphs.diffusion_efficiency.diffusion_efficiency(mtx)[source]¶

dyfunconn.graphs.gdd module¶

Graph Diffusion Distance

Notes¶

Based on the code accompanied the original paper. Available at https://www.researchgate.net/publication/259621918_A_Matlab_code_for_computing_the_GDD_presented_in_the_paper


[Hammond2013]Hammond, D. K., Gur, Y., & Johnson, C. R. (2013, December). Graph diffusion distance: A difference measure for weighted graphs based on the graph Laplacian exponential kernel. In Global Conference on Signal and Information Processing (GlobalSIP), 2013 IEEE (pp. 419-422). IEEE.

dyfunconn.graphs.mean_first_passage_time module¶

Mean First Passsage Time

Notes¶

  • This is a direct translation from BCT’s function “mean_first_passage_time.m” <https://sites.google.com/site/bctnet/Home/functions/mean_first_passage_time.m>`
  • Original author is Joaquin Goñi, IU Bloomington, 2012

dyfunconn.graphs.mi module¶

Mutual Information

Comparing two partitions using the mutual information theoretical metric.

Notes¶

Based on the code available at http://users.auth.gr/~stdimitr/files/software/vi.rar


dyfunconn.graphs.mi.mutual_information(indices_a, indices_b)[source]¶

Mutual Information

Returns:

MI : float

Mutual information.

NMI : float

Normalized mutual information.

dyfunconn.graphs.vi module¶

Variation of Information

Notes¶

Based on the code available at http://users.auth.gr/~stdimitr/files/software/vi.rar


[Dimitriadis2012]Dimitriadis, S. I., Laskaris, N. A., Michael Vourkas, V. T., & Micheloyannis, S. (2012). An EEG study of brain connectivity dynamics at the resting state. Nonlinear Dynamics-Psychology and Life Sciences, 16(1), 5.
